attributes.action: retain the acre as a measurement of land and outlaw any further attempts by the EU to scrap our imperial system of measurement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government seem intent on selling this country out to a European superstate. The people of this country are an independent island race and will always remain so. Our traditions and way of life are being eroded by european dictat and this is just another example of a weak government ceding sovereignty to foreign interests. KEEP THE ACRE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
